body.p:
This (http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing) is a URI defined in the
Web Services Addressing 1.0 - Core
and
Web Services Addressing 1.0 - SOAP Binding
2006-05-09 specifications.
This document describes the WS-Addressing 1.0 namespace. A RDDL version of this document is available.
The following URI always points to the latest schema (including errata) for the WS-Addressing 1.0 namespace. The resource at this location may change as new errata are incorporated.
body.h2: This dated version of the XML Schema:
body.p: The following URI points to the schema for the WS-Addressing 1.0 namespace corresponding to the 2006-05-09 specifications.
This namespace URI (http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing) is defined in a W3C Recommendation and is stable.
Comments on this document may be sent to the public public-ws-addressing-comments@w3.org mailing list (public archive).
